title: How to top 11th class science and maths - Quora

response.answer_text: Its quite easy to score well in science and maths in class 11. You only need to be focused and practice well. Firstly you have to pay attention in class and grasp as much as possible there so you could save on time. For maths you need to solve a lot of problems. Try solving all the exercise problems first. Then also solve the solved examples. It will be helpful. In science for physics you need to be good at your concepts and solve a lot of problems like math. Here you should keep one thing in mind however difficult the problem may look it ends up in a concept. So you should be good at your concepts. In chemistry you need to concentrate more on concepts. The problems here will be relatively easy but organic part could be a little tricky, so concentrate a bit more on that part. I would suggest you to write and practice the reactions. Inorganic goes mainly on memory. And Physical is the easiest. Biology, you just need to read the lessons and keep in mind all the key words. Diagrams are very important and labelling of the diagram too. Here you should pay attention towards the key words.(I assumed you are a PCMB student) For all the subjects I would suggest you to make summary sheets which contains all the formula, major reactions and important concepts. It will prove to be very useful. Thank you!! Sorry for any grammatical mistakes.
